text: Chittagong (officially called Chattogram or Chattagram) is a city in southeast Bangladesh near the Karnaphuli River. The city is the capital of the Chittagong district and division. The city has around 5.5 million people. == References == Category:Cities in Bangladesh Category:Chittagong Division Category:1340s establishments Category:Establishments in Bangladesh Category:14th-century establishments in Asia
title: Chittagong
